summary.span: 要导航到的文档完成下载时发生。

span.span: Occurs when the document being navigated to has finished downloading.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 导航的事件处理程序将传递类的一个实例 ，该类提供有关导航的上下文信息，其中包括 Web 响应详细信息。Navigated event handlers are passed an instance of the class, which provides contextual information about the navigation, including Web response details. 只会为顶级导航触发此事件。This event will only be fired for top-level navigations.

span.span: Gets or sets an instance of a public class, implemented by the host application, that can be accessed by script from a hosted document.

value.span: 作为 类的实例的 ，由主机应用程序实现且可由寄宿文档的脚本访问。

span.span: The that is an instance of a class, implemented by the host application, that can be accessed by script from a hosted document.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性可设置为您希望其公共属性和方法可用于脚本代码的任何 COM 可见对象。This property can be set to any COM-visible object for which you want its public properties and methods available to scripting code. 可以通过使用标记来使类成为 COM 可见的 。You can make a class COM-visible by marking it with the . 使用属性将为脚本设置的对象公开给当前文档 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_html](~/includes/tla2sharptla-html-md.md)] `window.external` 。The object that is set for scripting is exposed to the current document by the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_html](~/includes/tla2sharptla-html-md.md)] DOM using the `window.external` property.

exception.span: 是通过不属于 类型的实例设置的。

span.span: Reloads the current page with optional cache validation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果 `noCache` 为 `true` ，则 控件将在不进行缓存验证的情况下进行刷新，方法是向服务器发送 "Pragma：无缓存" 标头。If `noCache` is `true`, the control refreshes without cache validation by sending a "Pragma:no-cache" header to the server.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 设置源属性会导致 导航到指定的文档 。Setting the source property causes to navigate to the document specified by the . 如果 为 `null` ，则显示一个空白文档， ( "关于：空白" ) 。If the is `null`, a blank document is displayed ("about:blank"). ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何将配置 为 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_html](~/includes/tla2sharptla-html-md.md)] 仅使用标记导航到文档。The following example shows how to configure to navigate to an [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_html](~/includes/tla2sharptla-html-md.md)] document by using markup only. ```xaml ```
